org.eclipse.ecf.presence
Interface IPresenceSender

public interface IPresenceSender

Send presence change events to remotes on buddy list. Access to instances implementing this interface is provided by IPresenceContainerAdapter.getPresenceSender()

See Also:
IPresenceContainerAdapter

Method Summary
 void sendPresenceUpdate(ID fromID, ID toID, IPresence presence)
          Send a presence update to a remote target user
 void sendRosterAdd(ID fromID, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String[] groups)
          Send a roster add request (subscribe) to a remote
 void sendRosterRemove(ID fromID, ID userID)
          Send roster remove request (unsubscribe) to a remote
 

Method Detail

sendPresenceUpdate

void sendPresenceUpdate(ID fromID,
                        ID toID,
                        IPresence presence)
                        throws ECFException
Send a presence update to a remote target user

Parameters:
fromID - the user the update is from. Should not be null.
toID - the target user. Should not be null.
presence - the presence information. Should not be null.
Throws:
ECFException - thrown if request cannot be sent (e.g. because of previous disconnect

sendRosterAdd

void sendRosterAdd(ID fromID,
                   java.lang.String user,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String[] groups)
                   throws ECFException
Send a roster add request (subscribe) to a remote

Parameters:
fromID - the user the subscription request is from. Should not be null.
user - the account name of the target user. Should not be null.
groups - an array of group names that this use will belong to on the roster entry. Should not be null.
Throws:
ECFException - thrown if request cannot be sent (e.g. because of previous disconnect

sendRosterRemove

void sendRosterRemove(ID fromID,
                      ID userID)
                      throws ECFException
Send roster remove request (unsubscribe) to a remote

Parameters:
fromID - the user id the request is from. Should not be null.
userID - the user id the request it intended for. Should not be null
Throws:
ECFException - thrown if request cannot be sent (e.g. because of previous disconnect
